No Poverty.reason: Indirect relevance; course may support economic empowerment through entrepreneurship but poverty reduction is not explicitly addressed.

Zero Hunger.reason: No content related to food security or hunger issues.

Good Health and Well-being.reason: No direct focus on health or well-being; only minor indirect relevance through stress management or team collaboration.

Quality Education.reason: Course develops higher education skills in entrepreneurship, business planning, and problem-solving, contributing to quality education.

Gender Equality.reason: No explicit focus on gender equality or empowerment.

Clean Water and Sanitation.reason: No content addressing water or sanitation issues.

Affordable and Clean Energy.reason: No content related to energy production or sustainability.

Decent Work and Economic Growth.reason: Highly relevant; course fosters entrepreneurship skills, new venture creation, and business development, which contribute to economic growth and decent work opportunities.

Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure.reason: Relevant; course emphasizes new product development, business model innovation, and startup ecosystem engagement.

Reduced Inequalities.reason: Low relevance; course could indirectly promote equitable opportunities via entrepreneurship, but not explicitly addressed.

Sustainable Cities and Communities.reason: No direct focus on urban or community sustainability issues.

Responsible Consumption and Production.reason: Indirectly relevant through innovation and product development; no explicit coverage of sustainability in production or consumption.

Climate Action.reason: No content related to climate change mitigation or adaptation.

Life Below Water.reason: No relevance; course does not address marine or aquatic ecosystems.

Life on Land.reason: No relevance; terrestrial ecosystems are not covered.

Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions.reason: Minimal relevance; could indirectly support governance through business ethics understanding but not a focus.

Partnerships for the Goals.reason: Low relevance; course includes collaboration within teams but not international or multi-stakeholder SDG partnerships.
